mapper.select: select machine_type_id, machine_type_name, machine_type_information, machine_model, machine_manufacturer, orientation_position, machine_voltage, machine_power, remark from machine_type where machine_type_id = #{machineTypeId}
mapper.insert: insert into machine_type(machine_type_name, machine_type_information, machine_model, machine_manufacturer, orientation_position, machine_voltage, machine_power, remark) values (#{machineTypeName}, #{machineTypeInformation}, #{machineModel}, #{machineManufacturer}, #{orientationPosition}, #{machineVoltage}, #{machinePower}, #{remark})

insert into machine_type(machine_type_name, machine_type_information, machine_model, machine_manufacturer, orientation_position, machine_voltage, machine_power, remark) values
(#{entity.machineTypeName}, #{entity.machineTypeInformation}, #{entity.machineModel}, #{entity.machineManufacturer}, #{entity.orientationPosition}, #{entity.machineVoltage}, #{entity.machinePower}, #{entity.remark})

insert into machine_type(machine_type_name, machine_type_information, machine_model, machine_manufacturer, orientation_position, machine_voltage, machine_power, remark) values
(#{entity.machineTypeName}, #{entity.machineTypeInformation}, #{entity.machineModel}, #{entity.machineManufacturer}, #{entity.orientationPosition}, #{entity.machineVoltage}, #{entity.machinePower}, #{entity.remark})
on duplicate key update machine_type_name = values(machine_type_name), machine_type_information = values(machine_type_information), machine_model = values(machine_model), machine_manufacturer = values(machine_manufacturer), orientation_position = values(orientation_position), machine_voltage = values(machine_voltage), machine_power = values(machine_power), remark = values(remark)
mapper.update:
update machine_type
machine_type_name = #{machineTypeName},
machine_type_information = #{machineTypeInformation},
machine_model = #{machineModel},
machine_manufacturer = #{machineManufacturer},
orientation_position = #{orientationPosition},
machine_voltage = #{machineVoltage},
machine_power = #{machinePower},
remark = #{remark},
where machine_type_id = #{machineTypeId}
